data.text: @TheEliKlein @FenucciMiles At least we are masking toddlers forever to make sure we stay in green.
@TheEliKlein Hmm... where have we seen this before... https://t.co/yl2VXuaxmS

@DGoing5 @CaccioppoliMike @TheEliKlein @LondonBreed For now yes, but a motion has been introduced to repeal the ordinance. The ordinance will also sunset once the mayor's state of emergency is lifted.
https://t.co/CLyIEA291o
@randomperson_FA @CaccioppoliMike @TheEliKlein @LondonBreed Okay thansk. So is there a city ordinance for vaccine passports still or has that been lifted?
@TheEliKlein Hopefully it goes the way of the terrorist alerts soon.

@cynrojasla @TheEliKlein This is ridiculous. Seems like you’re the only person in LA County who realized this, and they’re getting away with this again - prepping for school restrictions in the future. @Elex_Michaelson can you report on this? This bogus system needs to be changed
@TheEliKlein You mean it's not about a global digital ID agenda?
@TheEliKlein @FillingTea But it's the science! Unfortunately when we heard that we didn't realize they were talking about political science.
